titles: The certainty of divine revelation A sermon preached at St. Martins in the Fields, Feb. 4. 1694/5. Being the second of the lecture for the ensuing year, founded by the honourable Robert Boyle, Esquire. By John Williams, D.D. chaplain in ordinary to His Majesty.
author: Williams, John, 1636?-1709.
Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.
publisher: printed for Ri. Chiswell, and Tho. Cockerill: at the Rose and Crown in St. Paul's Church-yard; and at the Three Legs in the Poultrey,
notes: With an initial imprimatur leaf dated Feb. 4. 1654/5. and signed Guil. Lancaster.
Reproduction of the original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge.
keywords: Bible. --  N.T --  Hebrews I, 1-2 --  Sermons --  Early works to 1800.
